Row.Text: I won't disclose the truth of this world. However, world. For even just a moment, I laid my hands on your secret.
I'm Yuni. Refer to me as Yuni-senpai with respect and adoration, newcomer.
I'm Yuni. Refer to me as Yuni-senpai with respect and adoration, newcomer.
I'm Yuni. Refer to me as Yuni-senpai with respect and adoration, newcomer.
So much for playing. Now it's time to learn.
Do you think that my life up until now has left anything of value in this world?
Ehh, no way, this is boring.
